author: Staff
title: 'Bear Grounds' again featured at UCA
text:
'Bear Grounds' again featured at UCA Posted: October 3, 2015 - 11:07am 
For the third year, the 'Bear Grounds" football experience will be a part of the pregame celebration of the University of Central Arkansas' football game against Abilene Christian. 

The event features local businesses that will set up booths for samples of products and prize giveaways three hours before the 6 p.m. kickoff. A bounce house and obstacle course will be set up for youngsters. 
DeBoard Electronics TV Watching Zone which will show college football games from throughout the country, while two radio stations, The Point 94.1 and 106.7 The Ride, will be broadcasting live and giving away prizes and playing music throughout the day.
